title.rendered: Exposure visits conducted for STeP students

content.rendered: Exposure Visits were conducted in centers of Delhi, Chennai, Kolkata and Bengaluru for the students of STeP centers. A total of 27 exposure visits were held. The programme aims to provide an exposure to the students with learning opportunities on latest trends and practices at the workplace. Some of the places the students were taken to were Big Bazaar and Westside.
